channel.title: Toxic Blowpipe turns me invisible :/
channel.description:
So im running a 317(soulsplit base) and ive added my toxic blowpipe models to the "raw" folder and the .gz to the "model" folder, done the add model command and registered the models.
The model in my inventory works fine, but when i wear it i turn invisible. :/

item.title: Toxic Blowpipe turns me invisible :/
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Your wield model is mostly wrong. Try seeing if the issue happens when changing gender. That way we can see if this is the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Toxic Blowpipe turns me invisible :/
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

could be using wrong models or check in ur item.cfg notepad and see if the case # from the client is already beeing used and u shouldnt even have to use the command add models

Read full topic
